about_the_game: The Age of Empires IV: 4K HDR Video Pack contains videos from the base game’s campaign and rewards that are increased to ultra-high fidelity resolution. Before you attempt to install, please make sure that your system requirements meet or exceed the minimum specs listed for this specific content pack.
detailed_description: The Age of Empires IV: 4K HDR Video Pack contains videos from the base game’s campaign and rewards that are increased to ultra-high fidelity resolution. Before you attempt to install, please make sure that your system requirements meet or exceed the minimum specs listed for this specific content pack.

fullgame.name: Age of Empires IV: Anniversary Edition

legal_notice: Copyright 2021 Microsoft Studios. All Rights Reserved. Age of Empires IV is a registered trademark of the Microsoft group of companies.
name: Age of Empires IV - 4K HDR Video Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit | Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: 3.6 GHz 6-core (Intel i5) or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 | CPU with AVX support required
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 970 GPU or AMD Radeon RX 570 GPU with 4GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 4 GB of video RAM and 16 GB of system RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Mild themes and violence
Online interactivity

short_description: The Age of Empires IV: 4K HDR Video Pack contains videos from the base game’s campaign and rewards that are increased to ultra-high fidelity resolution.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
